sql.if:
A.id as `article_id`, A.title as `article_title`, A.content as `article_content`, A.category_id as `article_category_id`, A.views as `article_views`, A.create_time as `article_create_time`, A.update_time as `article_update_time`,
C.id as `category_id`, C.name as `category_name`,
T.id as `tag_id`, T.name as `tag_name`

mapper.select: select * from blog_article order by rand() limit #{N}

select
from blog_article as A left join blog_article_tag as AT on A.id = AT.article_id left join blog_tag as T on T.id = AT.tag_id left join blog_category as C on C.id = A.category_id where A.id = #{articleId}
